tierList.description: Community tier rankings for optimal bike builds based on versatility, effectiveness, and performance across all maps and challenges.

S.label: S-Tier
S.description: Best overall builds - highly effective across multiple scenarios

builds.name: Speed Demon Build
builds.reason: Dominates score challenges and high-score runs. Essential for competitive play.

builds.name: Street Tech Build
builds.reason: Perfect for technical street riding. Excels in most maps with proper skill.

A.label: A-Tier
A.description: Excellent builds - strong choices for specific purposes

builds.name: All-Rounder Build
builds.reason: Best starter build. Viable for all content and forgiving to learn.

builds.name: Grind Machine Build
builds.reason: Dominates rail and grind challenges. Essential for grind-focused maps.

builds.name: Air Master Build
builds.reason: Best for air challenges and big tricks. Excels on specific maps.

builds.name: Park Flow Build
builds.reason: Excellent in skate park but limited elsewhere. Great for learning transitions.

tricks.name: Manual
tricks.reason: Core mechanic for combo extension. Required for high scores.

tricks.name: 360 Spin
tricks.reason: Versatile, easy to combo, consistent points.

tricks.name: Feeble Grind
tricks.reason: Balanced grind, works on most rails, combo-friendly.

tricks.name: Backflip
tricks.reason: High points, reliable, works in most situations.

tricks.name: Tailwhip
tricks.reason: Good points, combos well with spins.

tricks.name: 720 Spin
tricks.reason: Great for air sections, high points.

Expert.label: Expert Tricks
Expert.description: High risk, high reward - for advanced players

tricks.name: Double Backflip
tricks.reason: Massive points but requires perfect setup.

maps.name: Downtown District
maps.reason: Most content, best variety, longest combo potential.

maps.name: Urban Streets
maps.reason: Perfect street feel, excellent spot variety.

maps.name: Rooftop Run
maps.reason: Best for big airs and epic moments.

maps.name: The Skate Park
maps.reason: Perfect for learning but limited replayability.
